name: INSERT-ADVENTURE-HERE
description:
I can't draw.

So in this short platformer, you can draw instead!

Draw the player, enemy, upgrades and more to create a unique adventure!

Enter funny things under "Name something worthless", forget about it, and laugh as the player discards your hopes and dreams between levels!

A boss fight with something you drew, OMG!

please download today for freeeeee
